input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System, HP_ServiceCente,BMC_Remedyforce, ServiceNow

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The change concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: An XML document that contains detail for one or more incidents
An XML document containing failed changes.
String Value - Count of successful changes
String Value - Count of changes that failed creation.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific explanation for the value of success status.
An XML document - A process specific explanation for the value of success/failure status.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Change

input.value: The value of updated Change is ::

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("Unknown System: ", .)" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:if test="not(@name="") and not(@name="Infrastructure Change ID")"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <field-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1000000182</xsl:text> </field-id> <schema>${schema}</schema> <id>${change id}</id> <fields> <xsl:copy-of select="//field" /> </fields> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was unsuccessfull for Change ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("The update was unsuccessfull for Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""success"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:if test="not(@name="")"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

test="//field[@name="status"]/text() = 'closed'"> <entity-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">change</xsl:text> </entity-type> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">close-change</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys> <change-number> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="change-number"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text != '0'"> <SLAAgreement-i-d> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="SLAAgreement-i-d"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </SLAAgreement-i-d> </xsl:if> </header> <description-structure> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <description> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="description"]/text() != '0'"> <description> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </description> </xsl:if> </description> <justification> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Array</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="justification"]/text() != '0'"> <justification> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="justification"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </justification> </xsl:if> </justification> </description-structure> <middle> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text() != '0'"> <configuration-item> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </configuration-item> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="location"]/text() != '0'"> <location> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="location"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </location> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="outage-start"]/text() != '0'"> <outage-start> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="outage-start"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </outage-start> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="outage-end"]/text() != '0'"> <outage-end> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="outage-end"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </outage-end> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="scheduled-outage-start"]/text() != '0'"> <scheduled-outage-start> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="scheduled-outage-start"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </scheduled-outage-start> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="scheduled-outage-end"]/text() != '0'"> <scheduled-outage-end> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="scheduled-outage-end"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </scheduled-outage-end> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="actual-outage-start"]/text() != '0'"> <actual-outage-start> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="actual-outage-start"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </actual-outage-start> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="actual-outage-end"]/text() != '0'"> <actual-outage-end> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="actual-outage-end"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </actual-outage-end> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array1-line1"]/text() != '0' or //field[@name="misc-array1-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <misc-array1> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <misc-array1> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array1-line1"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array1-line1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array1-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array1-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> </misc-array1> </misc-array1> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array2-line1"]/text() != '0' or //field[@name="misc-arry2-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <misc-array2> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <misc-array2> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array2-line1"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array2-line1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="misc-array2-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="misc-array2-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> </misc-array2> </misc-array2> </xsl:if> <assets> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="assets-line1"]/text() != '0' or //field[@name="assets-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <assets> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="assets-line1"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="assets-line1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="assets-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="assets-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> </assets> </xsl:if> </assets> </middle> <close> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="completion-code"]/text() != '0'"> <completion-code> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="completion-code"]/text()" /> </value> </completion-code> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </xsl:if> </close> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="urgency"]/text() != '0'"> <urgency> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="urgency"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </urgency> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="initial-assessment"]/text() != '0'"> <initial-assessment> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="initial-assessment"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </initial-assessment> </xsl:if> </instance> </model> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to update change because of the following: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("Unable to update change because of the following: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Changes/*" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("Unable to retrieve Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""success"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <object> <xsl:for-each select="//object"> <type> <xsl:value-of select="'${o type}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </type> <xsl:copy-of select="./*" /> </xsl:for-each> </object> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("Unable to retrieve Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""success"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:if test="not(@name="") and not(@name="Infrastructure Change ID")"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <query> <number>${change id}</number> </query> <update> <xsl:for-each select="//field[@name!='number']"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('<',@name,'>',.,'</',@name,'>')" disable-output-escaping="yes" /> </xsl:for-each> </update> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was unsuccessfull for Change ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("The update was unsuccessfull for Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.) = 'failure'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""success"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("The update was completed successfully for Change ID: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Change[1]" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${failed Change} </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${statusmessage} </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${change} </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> ${statusmessage} </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will update a change record. Any data provided in concept element fields will be updated.
